net.rptools.maptool.model.MacroButtonPro.label: l4m.isLogLevelEnabled
net.rptools.maptool.model.MacroButtonPro.toolTip: arg(0) = Log level (ERROR, WARN, INFO, DEBUG, TRACE) arg(1) = (Optional) Category (Macro name, token library, any user defined value). If not specified or category is not defined, root l4m.er configuration is evaluated. arg(2) = (Optional) Property Suffix (".level", ".entryExit")] Returns 0 = Not enabled or 1 = Is enabled
